argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatric.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatric.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatric.s | |- S = ( A |`s C ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` A ) = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` A ) = ( .s ` A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. ( Base ` R ) |-> ( x ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) = ( x e. ( Base ` R ) |-> ( x ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 1, 5, 6, 7, 2, 3 | #P_scmatrngiso | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( x e. ( Base ` R ) |-> ( x ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) e. ( R RingIso S ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( ( x e. ( Base ` R ) |-> ( x ( .s ` A ) ( 1r ` A ) ) ) e. ( R RingIso S ) -> ( R RingIso S ) =/= (/) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( R RingIso S ) =/= (/) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_brric | |- ( R ~=r S <-> ( R RingIso S ) =/= (/) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> R ~=r S ) |
